name: hyperpipe
description: Hyperpipe is a privacy friendly YouTube front end that can be self hosted. It proxies video and audio streams, removes tracking and ads, and presents content in a clean interface for safer watching.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Access YouTube content through a privacy-respecting proxy server

features.title: Audio Streaming
features.description: Stream music from YouTube with audio-only mode to save bandwidth

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for videos and channels without leaving the interface

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Subscribe to channels and get updates without Google account

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own instance for complete privacy and control
